title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.05 - Use of STOP (R1-1) or YIELD (R1-2) Signs without Crossbuck Signs at Highway-LRT Grade Crossings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.05 - Use of STOP (R1-1) or YIELD (R1-2) Signs without Crossbuck Signs at Highway-LRT Grade Crossings

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Support: 00A Section 1685 of the New York State Vehicle and Traffic

Law allows the installation of a STOP (R1-1) sign only with prior authorization
from the New York State Department of Transportation at any highway-LRT
crossing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8B.05

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
